subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2998
description_text:
ok i agree the order the silver pedals. do you ship them now? Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 22.10.2025 um 11:45 schrieb SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>: ï»¿
 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our Plus X P2-H2/Black is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, with restocking expected by the end of the month. We can offer you a replacement in the silver version: Plus X P2-H2/Silver/with Baseplate. Alternatively, you may upgrade to the three-pedal set Plus X P3-H3/Black/with Baseplate at a discounted price of $34.90, representing a saving of $47.10 on the original price difference. Either of these options can be dispatched immediately from our German warehouse. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com
